explorer
Class EntityTableModel

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      explorer.EntityTableModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Clearable, Refresher, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
AttributeTableModel, CommandTableModel
public abstract class EntityTableModel
extends javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
implements Refresher, Clearable

EntityTableModel implements parts of the table model needed by EntityTable

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Erik Assum
See Also:
Serialized Form
